name: How much do you know about U2 Lyrics? | Quiz

questions.text: 'It's a bitter pill I swallow here'
questions.explanation:
Van Diemen's Land.

	From 'Rattle and Hum', 2nd song.

options: When I Look at the World
questions.explanation:
40.

	From 'War' (live version on 'Under a Blood Red Sky'). It's the last song on both albums.

questions.text: 'Many lost who seek to find themselves in me'
questions.explanation:
Love Rescue Me.

	From 'Rattle and Hum'. It's a duet with Bob Dylan.

questions.text: 'I'll cross the sky for your love'
'I awoke with a tear on my tongue'
'We thought that we had the answers'
questions.explanation:
11 O'Clock Tick Tock.

	From 'Under A Blood Red Sky', 2nd song.

questions.text: 'The wheels fly and the colors spin'
options: Tryin' To Throw Your Arms Around The World
questions.explanation:
The Unforgettable Fire.

	From 'The Unforgettable Fire', 4th song.

questions.text: 'Squeeze the handle - blow out the candle'
options: Until The End Of The World
questions.explanation:
Love Is Blindness.

	From 'Achtung, Baby' - 12th and last song.
